response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe is worth far more than its actual asking price. Given its exceptional value and unique features, I am confident it will significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its true worth, I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, designed to ensure you have the chance to secure this invaluable asset without delay.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can arrange for immediate delivery and all necessary paperwork. Should you require any additional information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
